typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Row ID} as string,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		Discount as string,
		{Unit Price} as string,
		{Shipping Cost} as string,
		{Customer ID} as string,
		{Customer Name} as string,
		{Ship Mode} as string,
		{Customer Segment} as string,
		{Product Category} as string,
		{Product Sub-Category} as string,
		{Product Container} as string,
		{Product Name} as string,
		{Product Base Margin} as string,
		Country as string,
		Region as string,
		{State or Province} as string,
		City as string,
		{Postal Code} as string,
		{Order Date} as string,
		{Ship Date} as string,
		Profit as string,
		{Quantity ordered new} as string,
		Sales as string,
		{Order ID} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SRCOrders
source(output(
		{Row ID} as short,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		Discount as double,
		{Unit Price} as double,
		{Shipping Cost} as double,
		{Customer ID} as short,
		{Customer Name} as string,
		{Ship Mode} as string,
		{Customer Segment} as string,
		{Product Category} as string,
		{Product Sub-Category} as string,
		{Product Container} as string,
		{Product Name} as string,
		{Product Base Margin} as double,
		Country as string,
		Region as string,
		{State or Province} as string,
		City as string,
		{Postal Code} as integer,
		{Order Date} as integer,
		{Ship Date} as integer,
		Profit as double,
		{Quantity ordered new} as short,
		Sales as double,
		{Order ID} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SRCOrdersWeekly
source(output(
		Region as string,
		Cost as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SRCRegionCost
source(output(
		{Order ID} as integer,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SRCReturns
source(output(
		Region as string,
		Manager as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SRCUsers
SRCOrders, SRCOrdersWeekly union(byName: true)~> LJoinOrdersWeekly
LJoinOrdersWeekly, SRCRegionCost join(LJoinOrdersWeekly@Region == SRCRegionCost@Region,
	joinType:'left',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LJoinReturns
LJoinReturns, SRCReturns join(LJoinOrdersWeekly@{Order ID} == SRCReturns@{Order ID},
	joinType:'left',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LJoinRegionCost
LJoinRegionCost, SRCUsers join(SRCRegionCost@Region == SRCUsers@Region,
	joinType:'left',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LJoinUsers
LJoinUsers select(mapColumn(
		{Row ID},
		{Order Priority},
		Discount,
		{Unit Price},
		{Shipping Cost},
		{Customer ID},
		{Customer Name},
		{Ship Mode},
		{Customer Segment},
		{Product Category},
		{Product Sub-Category},
		{Product Container},
		{Product Name},
		{Product Base Margin},
		Country,
		Region = LJoinOrdersWeekly@Region,
		{State or Province},
		City,
		{Postal Code},
		{Order Date},
		{Ship Date},
		Profit,
		{Quantity ordered new},
		Sales,
		{Order ID} = LJoinOrdersWeekly@{Order ID},
		Region = SRCRegionCost@Region,
		Cost,
		{Order ID} = SRCReturns@{Order ID},
		Status,
		Region = SRCUsers@Region,
		Manager
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveDuplicateColumns
RemoveDuplicateColumns split(Profit > 0,
	Profit <=0,
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Profit, Loss)
ConditionalSplit1@Profit sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Profit.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Profit
ConditionalSplit1@Loss sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Loss.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Loss
RemoveDuplicateColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Orders.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> OrdersFact
SRCRegionCost sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['RegionCost.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RegionCostDim
SRCReturns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Returns.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ReturnsDim
SRCUsers sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Users.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> UsersDim
